title: Loan Details
description: Contains all loan specifics, such as loan type, amount, rate, & term.

xdm:totalInterestPaid.title: Total Interest Paid
xdm:totalInterestPaid.description: Total amount of interest paid on the loan to date.

xdm:totalPrincipalPaid.title: Total Principal Paid
xdm:totalPrincipalPaid.description: Total amount of principal paid on the loan to date.

xdm:status.title: Status
xdm:status.description: Indicates the current status of the loan.

xdm:termInMonths.title: Term in Months
xdm:termInMonths.description: Captures the length of the loan, in months.

xdm:annualPercentageRate.title: Annual Percentage Rate
xdm:annualPercentageRate.description: Records the annual percentage rate of the loan.

xdm:downpayment.title: Downpayment
xdm:downpayment.description: Captures the downpayment amount of loan.

xdm:interestRate.title: Interest Rate
xdm:interestRate.description: Captures the interest rate of the loan.

xdm:borrower.title: Borrower
xdm:borrower.description: Records the details for the borrower.

xdm:fees.title: Fees
xdm:fees.description: Tracks any fees or commissions applied to the loan.

xdm:gracePeriod.title: Grace Period
xdm:gracePeriod.description: Tracks the number of days a borrow has to issue a loan payment before the loan is considered to be in default.

xdm:type.title: Type
xdm:type.description: Records the type of loan issued.

xdm:renegotiable.title: Renegotiable
xdm:renegotiable.description: Identifies if the loan can be renegotiated while it is still active.

xdm:collateralRequired.title: Collateral Required
xdm:collateralRequired.description: Indicates if collateral has been provided to secure the loan.
